title: 2025 TVS One Make Championship registrations open
description: Registrations for the 2025 Petronas TVS India One Make Championship are now open and selection rounds will be held from May 9-11 at the Madras International Circuit. These selection rounds will be for all four categories – Rookie, RR310, Women and TVS’ Young Media Racer Program. Selection rounds on May 9-11 National Championship to start end-April 2025 TVS One Make Championship selection rounds 2025 TVS One Make Championship selection roundsCategoryCriteriaRequirementsDateVenueRookieRiders aged 15 to 21 years (Born between 1/1/2006 – 1/1/2010)Level 1 FMSCI Training School Certification; Must be accompanied by a guardian at the selection venueMay 11Madras International Circuit, ChennaiRR310Riders under 30 years (Born after 1/1/1996)Must have at least one podium finish in a National Championship or One Make ChampionshipMay 11Madras International Circuit, ChennaiWomenRiders under 40 years (Born between 1/1/1986 – 1/1/2010)Level 1 FMSCI Training School CertificationMay 10Madras International Circuit, ChennaiYoung Media Racer ProgramRiders under 30 years (Born after 1/1/1996)By invitationMay 9Madras International Circuit, Chennai All participants will be equipped with Alpinestar airbag jackets, FIM-certified helmets, and FIM-spec racing suits. All those interested in registering can call +91 9632253833. Riders who make it through the selection rounds will get to compete in this year’s TVS India One Make Championship, which runs as part of the MRF MMSC Indian National Motorcycle Racing Championship. The rookie and women’s categories will see participants competing on race-spec TVS Apache RTR 200 bikes. As the name suggests, riders in the RR310 category will race on the higher performance race-spec Apache RR310 bikes. And finally, the Young Media Racer Program will use the Apache RTR 200 4V. html:
Selection rounds will be held at the Madras International Circuit in May.

Registrations for the 2025 Petronas TVS India One Make Championship are now open and selection rounds will be held from May 9-11 at the Madras International Circuit. These selection rounds will be for all four categories – Rookie, RR310, Women and TVS’ Young Media Racer Program.

  1. Selection rounds on May 9-11
  2. National Championship to start end-April

2025 TVS One Make Championship selection rounds

2025 TVS One Make Championship selection rounds
CategoryCriteriaRequirementsDateVenue
RookieRiders aged 15 to 21 years (Born between 1/1/2006 – 1/1/2010)Level 1 FMSCI Training School Certification; Must be accompanied by a guardian at the selection venueMay 11Madras International Circuit, Chennai
RR310Riders under 30 years (Born after 1/1/1996)Must have at least one podium finish in a National Championship or One Make ChampionshipMay 11Madras International Circuit, Chennai
WomenRiders under 40 years (Born between 1/1/1986 – 1/1/2010)Level 1 FMSCI Training School CertificationMay 10Madras International Circuit, Chennai
Young Media Racer ProgramRiders under 30 years (Born after 1/1/1996)By invitationMay 9Madras International Circuit, Chennai

All participants will be equipped with Alpinestar airbag jackets, FIM-certified helmets, and FIM-spec racing suits. All those interested in registering can call +91 9632253833.

Riders who make it through the selection rounds will get to compete in this year’s TVS India One Make Championship, which runs as part of the MRF MMSC Indian National Motorcycle Racing Championship.

The rookie and women’s categories will see participants competing on race-spec TVS Apache RTR 200 bikes. As the name suggests, riders in the RR310 category will race on the higher performance race-spec Apache RR310 bikes. And finally, the Young Media Racer Program will use the Apache RTR 200 4V.
